phrases: The rebelling human vermin have connected the Dragon Chain Cannon to the giant lacrima
and are trying to crash it into Extalia.
Nichiya-sama, as well as the majority of the Royal Guard, have been turned into a lacrima,
and are now being held captive in the Royal City.
To think they would go so far...
Furthermore, one of the Fallen and a human have appeared in the town,
and are spreading the word to abandon Extalia and escape...
They are causing a riot outside of the castle...
How should we deal with the situation?
What are you intending to do?
Hurry and destroy the lacrima and turn everyone back to normal!
We are not coming even close to stopping it!
We will finish this later, cat!
I are not runnin' or hidin'!
I am going to stop this thing and finish this!
You are going to stop it?
The entire floating island connected to the Dragon Chain?
There is no tomorrow for us.
And then I am going to make you my cat.
It is no use, they are going to hit!
Why have not you returned everyone else to normal like us?
That black cat got in my way!
It would take too much time now!
We have no choice but to stop it!
We are totally going to stop it, damn it!
I realized that I do not need eternal magic power!
I would rather have eternal smiles!
No matter what you do, you will never stop this island!
Even if this body crumbles to bits, I will stop it just with my soul!!
What the hell is going on?
They are planning on rebelling against the Exceed?
Those damn humans do not realize our Queen's power...
You will learn some respect today!
I am sure our Queen's magic will come out anytime now!
Sure, but I hope we counterattack soon, or...
It seems to have stopped at the edge of the island.
It was not supposed to turn out like...
It is too early to give up hope!
You are still here, you Fallen?!
These people came here to warn us of danger!
But because no one listened to them, it is turned out like this!
With our Queen's magic, something like this is no problem!
Then listen calmly to what I am about to say.
Because I bet she is going to do some incredibly destructive magic...
Right now, Extalia is on the brink of complete destruction.
It is a fate we can no longer resist.
Therefore, I have made a decision.
You are going to wipe out all the humans, right?
I decided that I must tell everyone the truth.
I am hardly a Queen, and most definitely not a god.
I am an Exceed, the same as you all.
I have no power to fight the humans.
As you can see, I am one-winged.
For an Exceed, one's wings grow and shrink by one's own magic power.
With both wings, one can display one's true magic power.
My magic power is extremely weak.
I am so sorry I hid all of this...
You are Wendy-san and Carla-san, yes?
I must apologize to you as well.
Please, do not hate me, everyone.
The ones who created the Queen were we elders.
We are a very weak race.
Since long ago, we have had terrible things done to us by the humans.
Therefore, to protect ourselves, we made the humans believe that we had power.
Then, for all Exceeds to gain back their self-confidence,
we had everyone in Extalia believe that they were protected by the power of God.
The power of God was nothing more than a bluff known only to us few Exceeds...
At first, the humans did not believe us,
but before long they began to fear the power of God...
For example, the Human Control that decides when humans die...
It is all actually after the fact.
We do not decide what humans are killed...
We do not have such power, of course.
The only thing we have is that Chagot can see a little bit into the future.
When she was correct, we made people think it was she who killed them.
Chagot-sama, hurry and destroy the humans!
Whether or not you actually have power, you ordered me to kill my friends!
That I know to be the truth!
Chagot never gave such an order!
It must have been the humans who used the Queen to...
You placed strange memories, messing with my head!
You ordered me to eliminate the Dragon Slayers, yes?
There is a really long, important reason for that...
Even if there is a reason, I will never forgive you!
Carla, now is really not the time...
You had no sin in this.
And yet, I made you bear the most painful feelings of all.
Please pass judgment on me for my sins by your own hand!
Pass judgment by your own hands!
You, who love both the Exceed and the Humans, have such a right!
Now everyone, get away from here!
My fate lies alongside Extalia as it falls to ruin!
We do not want to leave you...
This is the end of our history...
That is why the Queen felt she had to tell us everything...
But I want to be with you, Queen!
I want to stay here, too!
This country is fated for destruction!
How dare you just give up?!
Cannot you do anything without a god or queen?!
Did not you try your best to live on, even if it was a lie?
So why are you giving up so easily?
So what if you are weak?
If everyone works together, you can accomplish anything!
This country will not be destroyed!
I will stop it, no matter what!
After all, I love this country!
I think I am going to be crushed!
This is not something humans can do anything about, no matter how strong they are!
I am not going to give up... on Fairy Tail... or on Extalia!
I am going to protect them both!
I want to protect it, too!
And I bet everyone else does, too...
We will protect our country ourselves!
We came through dangerous times and protected our country and its people!
Everyone, we have got to do something about this now!
Chagot, with your wing, you cannot...
I must do what I can!
Extalia has joined together as one...
Lily, why did you save a human?
Because the child was seriously wounded...
Bringing that thing to Extalia is a grave offense!
However, I must help the injured, even if they be human.
You did not forget the rules, right, Lily?
You are now made one of the Fallen, and are banished from Extalia!
It was not your fault I was banished.
First thing I must do is escort you home.
No matter how much I may resent it, Extalia is my country!
Even with this many Exceed, they cannot stop it.
I could have stopped the humans!
I know your feelings will get through!
We are not going to lose!
We are going to stop it, for sure!
The lacrima is being pushed back..
The Dragon Chain Cannon's chain as well...
It has been returned to Earthland.
I searched for the remaining tear from the giant Anima to return everything to the way it was.
Without everyone is help, I would not have made it.
The lacrima has passed once again through the Anima and returned to how it was in Earthland.
I am glad I was able to protect your homeland...
Hey, Happy, there is a dragon-looking thing out there...
Was not there something like that before?
I think you are talking about the Dragonoid...
They are both just fake dragons, right?
I will bust it up like I did the last one!
If it is just coming out now, there must be something to it.
Magic does not work on it?
I guess this is not dragon slaying, it is chameleon slaying.
